name: The Plummet
description:
The Plummet is a platforming stealth game where you must travel as deep into the depths as possible. With infinite caves to play through, you never know what to expect. Use your flares to navigate the darkness, bombs to blow up a blocked path, and rope to create bridges between a never-ending cavern. Find upgrades in crates to enhance your tools, and most importantly:

EXPECT A LOT OF DEATH
